ComicInfo.Series: My Little Pony: Classics Reimagined - The Unicorn of Odd
ComicInfo.Summary: There's no place like Ponyville, Kansas. The Land of Odd has been magical, and Dorothy has made the most wonderful friends, but she's determined to get back to her family. Only first she needs to defeat a wicked princess, save her friends, escape the flying monkeys, talk to a wizard, wear a hat, talk to a puppet... Oh, why does nothing ever make sense in this silly world?!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 20:52:37. [CVDB1038449] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:09:46. [Issue ID 2593279]
